name: netbox
label: NetBox
description: NetBox is the leading solution for modeling and documenting modern networks. By combining the traditional disciplines of IP address management (IPAM) and datacenter infrastructure management (DCIM) with powerful APIs and extensions, NetBox provides the ideal "source of truth" to power network automation.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the IP address or hostname of the NetBox server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the IP address or hostname of the NetBox server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Token that is generated through the NetBox server.
fields.description: Specify the API Token that is generated through the NetBox server.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get IP Address List
operations.description: Get a list of IP address objects in your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: IDs
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of IDs which you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of IDs which you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Address
parameters.name: address
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of Addresses value whose IP Address object you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Addresses value whose IP Address object you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Roles
parameters.name: role
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of Role whose IP Address you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Role whose IP Address you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tag
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of Tags names whose IP Address you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Tags names whose IP Address you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Search
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Specify the search query with which you want to filter the results.
parameters.description: Specify the search query with which you want to filter the results.

parameters.title: Address Family
parameters.name: family
parameters.tooltip: Specify the family number with which you want to filter the results.
parameters.description: Specify the family number with which you want to filter the results.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the operational status of the object you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify the operational status of the object you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Order by Field
parameters.name: ordering
parameters.tooltip: Specify the field to use when ordering the results.
parameters.description: Specify the field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the initial index from which to return the results.
parameters.description: Specify the initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Number of results to return per page.
parameters.description: Specify the Number of results to return per page.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to Netbox REST API Documentation
parameters.description: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to Netbox REST API Documentation
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Get IP Address
operations.description: Retrieve a detail view of IP address object from your NetBox instance based on given IP address ID.

parameters.title: IP Address ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address in Netbox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address in Netbox instance.

operations.title: Update IP Address
operations.description: Update a IP address object from your NetBox instance based on given IP address ID and other parameters.

parameters.title: IP Address ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address in Netbox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address in Netbox instance.

parameters.title: Fields to be updated
parameters.name: patch_fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify the fields and field values that you want to update in IP address object on Netbox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the fields and field values that you want to update in IP address object on Netbox instance.

operations.title: Delete IP Address
operations.description: Delete an IP address object from your NetBox instance based on given IP address ID.

parameters.title: IP Address ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address in Netbox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address in Netbox instance.

operations.title: Get Prefix List
operations.description: Get a list of IP address Prefix objects in your NetBox instance. A prefix might be represented as "192.168.1.0/24." Here, "192.168.1.0" is the network address, and "/24" denotes the subnet mask

parameters.title: IDs
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of IDs which you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of IDs which you want to fetch.

parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Prefix names you want to fetch.

parameters.name: tag

parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Tags names whose Prefix you want to fetch.

parameters.tooltip: Specify the search query with which you want to filter the results.
parameters.description: Specify the search query with which you want to filter the results.

parameters.description: Specify the family number with which you want to filter the results.

parameters.description: Specify the operational status of the object you want to fetch.

parameters.description: Specify the field to use when ordering the results.

parameters.description: Specify the initial index from which to return the results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Number of results to return per page.
parameters.description: Specify the Number of results to return per page.

operations.title: Get Devices List
operations.description: Get a list of all Devices associated with your NetBox instance. A Device refers to the various pieces of equipment or hardware that make up a network or data center infrastructure.

parameters.title: IDs
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of IDs which you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of IDs which you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Name
parameters.name: name
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of Device names which you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Device names which you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Region IDs
parameters.name: region_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of Region IDs whose Devices you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Region IDs whose Devices you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Sites
parameters.name: site
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of Site Slug names whose Devices you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Site Slug names whose Devices you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Rack IDs

parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of Type of Devices (Slug names) which you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Type of Devices (Slug names) which you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Asset Tags
parameters.name: asset_tag
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma separated values of Asset Tags which is attached to Devices you want to fetch.
parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Asset Tags which is attached to Devices you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Tenants

parameters.description: Specify comma separated values of Tenant Slug names whose Devices you want to fetch.

parameters.description: Specify the search query with which you want to filter the results.

parameters.description: Specify the search query with which you want to filter the results. Ex:- label name of Cable
